name: The Hungry Penguin
description:
This game was made in 5 days for the Jame Gam #25.  Created in the Godot Game Engine.

Theme: Unintended Consequences. Special Object: Butter Chicken.

This little penguin is very hungry and wants to eat the fabled, "Butter Chicken". But each time he eats, he gets heavier! Eat the chicken in the correct order, so he can be satisfied.

Music by me: beepbox.co

Press 'R' to restart
